summary: This document is an email chain from August 13, 2019, discussing a request for the name of the FBI Special Agent assigned to the Jeffrey Epstein case. The request is made to the Victim Witness Coordinator at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, and the response indicates the agent's name is redacted but that the agent's partner is a TF0 from the NYPD.

persons.name: TF0
persons.context: Mentioned as the partner of the FBI Special Agent assigned to the Epstein case. The name appears to be a placeholder or redaction code.

events.title: Request for FBI Agent's Name
events.description: An email request is made to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the name of the FBI Special Agent on the Epstein case, with a response providing the agent's name (redacted) and noting the agent's NYPD partner.

locations.context: Address of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, where the Victim Witness Coordinator is based.

keyFacts: An email on August 13, 2019, discusses obtaining the name of the FBI Special Agent assigned to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
The FBI agent's name is redacted in the document, but the response notes the agent's partner is 'TF0' from the NYPD.
The request was directed to the Victim Witness Coordinator at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The correspondence indicates coordination between federal (FBI/US Attorney) and local (NYPD) law enforcement on the Epstein case.
